text: Mandali may refer to: * Mandali (Meher Baba), the inner circle of disciples of Meher Baba * Mandali, a gathering of bhajan performers * Mandali caste, a social group of Gujarat, India * Mandali, Iraq, a town in Iraq * Mandali, Iran, a village in Iran * Mandhali, a village in Punjab, India == People with the name == * Mandali Mendrilla (born 1976), American fashion designer * Mandali Buddha Prasad (born 1956), Indian politician * Mandali Venkata Krishna Rao (1926–1997), Indian politician == See also == * Mandali Puja * Mandala (disambiguation) * Mandalay (disambiguation)
title: Mandali
